comment.body:
It seems that provided link is incorrect, it should be - `https://www.peachesandcream.co.nz/` and this website loads correctly on my end.

Please check if issue occurs with `Stealth mode` disabled.
If so, please disable filter lists one by one and check which one causes this issue.

issue.title: bdnews24.com

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://bdnews24.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbdnews24.com%2F) ### Comment Username: @Bhooty > Ads leftovers are there, tried reinstalling but still same. Tried ublock origin with adguard filters and ublock filters only but still same with leftovers. But if I turn on Easylist in ad blocking section of adguard extension or ublock then the leftovers go instantly. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/RzVfIXq.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.1.36 Browser: | Firefox Stealth mode: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Social Widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Annoyances:
AdGuard Annoyances Other extensions used: | Bitwarden

comment.body:
Easylist is a part of AdGuard Base filter(except ubo, you need that filter there).
Please upload a saved page here(ZIP).
